About the Company: Continental Controls Ltd is the leading manufacturer of electrical protection and control devices in the world. Their products are designed to protect electrical equipments and appliances against fire and damage and also to provide safety to the user.Product range of the company includes Thermal Overload Protectors,One Shot Thermal Cut Off,Electronic Water Level Controller,Automotive Protective Motor,Protector for Air Conditioner Compressor,etc
